website_summaries.verdict: When compared with high-rated competitors, Mister Max stands at the top of the pack for both its effectiveness and versatility.
pros: A versatile, safe, and dependable enzymatic cleaner that works on urine and other odors and stains caused by dogs, cats, and even wild animals
Not just for floors – practical for upholstery, fabrics, and other surfaces
cons: While pet owners found that it doesn't work on all issues, most have commented that it is the best in its class for removing stains and odors

customer_reviews.title: Good product, however a deceptive practice from company
customer_reviews.text: I have used anti icky poo for years. I rescue cats and have a number of cats. This is the only product I found that removes the smell of urine when a cat sprays. However I bought this last bottle from this company as a used product and they were selling it half price. I have been using the used bottle for 2 weeks now and none of my pee smell is going away. I believe this gallon bottle has been filled with half water and sold as a good product. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It works to remove cat urine odor and it has virtually no scent. Cons: If you use it on hard surfaces (tile, laminate floors) it leaves a sticky, waxy residue that's difficult to remove. I haven't used it on carpet or other soft surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my Multi abused carpet!
customer_reviews.text: really got the carpet spot cleaned up the first time. But follow directions definitely need to treat more than one if area used multiple times. Got a kitten last year and my old guy was NOT happy this year a Puppy needless to say he showed his annoyance. It's the same area! last year I used YT methods a few treatmentsI think like 3xs, did a good got the job. But, this was better after 1x, I predict perfect after a few times. I recommend using a spray bottle for more controlled distribution. Follow up with a NO MARK i used essential oils but you can purchase I'd add more essential oil though the one I bought wasn't very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Charissel824

customer_reviews.title: OMG I WOULD GIVE THIS 20 STARS IF I COULD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much money on other products, including Nature's Miracle and dozens of boxes of baking soda and bottles of vinegar, and never could get rid of the smell of dog urine on my manufactured wood (Trex) deck. So I bought this product based on good reviews and used it ONE TIME and even diluted it 2 to 1 with water and THE SMELL IS GONE!!!! What a glorious world it would be if all products worked this well!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: La Boheme

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of urine odor from concrete floor
customer_reviews.text: After using vinegar and water solution multiple times to try and remove old pet urine stains and odors from the concrete floor of a home we are renovating, we decided to try this. Mixed it 1:1 and sprayed it on with a garden sprayer. Worked like a charm! All the odor is gone and you could actually see it dissolving the stains under the black light we were using to find all the spots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Gold - for removing stink from concrete!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little cheaper, but this stuff is MAGICAL!!! We bought a house that was infested with chipmunks (if which the smell must have been masked during the walkthrough and inspection), and we tried everything to get the smell of ‘munk urine out of the walls and concrete. Baking soda, vinegar, Home Depot smell traps, bleaching the floors, etc. It wasn’t until we came across this product were we able to remove the smell from the concrete. I think we used 6 or 7 jugs, and it was expensive, but it worked!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: The house I bought had unbearable pet odor, waste, urine right through the subfloors.Even with remodling, the place smelled awful! You name it, I tried, kilz, vinegar, H proxicide, bleach, baking soda,spray paint and more.. all that certainly made a dent..but it still stink. Before cutting out the floors I tried one last dictch effort..one full strenght dousing of ANTI ICKY POO did it. I am not exaggerating! I swear.. i will recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: M. Pergo

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER TO REMOVE CAT URINE ODORS
customer_reviews.text: Anti Icky Poo was recommended to me by a vet tech when my very elderly cat became incontinent, and Anti Icky Poo really works! Anti Icky Poo really does remove pet odors including cat urine, cat vomit, cat poop, and every other smell your kitty or puppy can produce! When cats get elderly, sick, or angry, they really will pee and release other foul smelling liquids all over your clothes, sheets, and carpet. Anti Icky Poo completely eliminated the smell from my clothes, sheets, and carpet! I love Anti Icky Poo products!!!!!! Anti Icky Poo saved my favorite jeans, sheets, blankets, and carpet! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Margot C. Rudell

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat urine - completely removes smell
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that sprays, luckily inside the litterbox, but it gets all over the plastic and stinks quickly. I use this several times a week, I buy a gallon of this about every 4 months. It's great at removing cat urine stink! Super impressive. Just updating this review more than a year later to confirm that I still use this-nearly every day. It completely removes urine smell and I'm so glad it's unscented - I can't stand fake fragrance not to mention the VOC carcinogens in them that is added to every cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Please Do Not Use Icky Poo
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product not remove the scent of dog urine (not old stained dog urine. It was fresh dog urine that was completely moped up prior to using Icky Poo) it left a significant stain on the carpet and an unbelievably sudsy and sticky residue. Adding a detergent to the solution along with chemicals to promote suds makes this product a very bad choice for any one who wants to use it. I say do not use this product. It will destroy what you use it one and you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: No lingering scent smell
customer_reviews.text: Used this to get urine smell off car carpet. It removed the smell to my satisfication. Also no scent added and so no lingering perfume smell like some other products I have tried. In fact another leading product which is number one in recommendations across several websites leaves an undesirable scent in my experience Update: I also used to treat urine soaked perforated leather in car. Took the urine smell away. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner without a perfume smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff to clean up dog pee. Doesn’t bleach out colors and doesn’t have any scent so you do t have some gross perfume smell after. I used to use a different brand and likes the smell at first, but once you clean up pee with it so many times the scented cleaners start to make me sick! This one does a GREAT job and doesn’t smell at all which I love! I also love the giant bottle that I use to refill my other brand’s squirt bottles with.
customer_reviews.author: kiddiefondue

customer_reviews.title: Only product that worked for cat pee.
customer_reviews.text: My cat peed on my carpet several times while I was on vacation. I tried a cheap bottle of enzyme cleaner, Angry Orange, 409 Carpet Cleaner, vinegar, and steam cleaning. Nothing helped. This product is the only thing that worked. One half bottle eliminated the odor from most of the spot. The rest is bring retreated, but I expect it will fix the rest of the issue. It's already an amazing improvement compared to everything else. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Trenton

customer_reviews.title: Like Magic!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic. I had a huge mouse nest in a wall and the smell has been driving me nuts for a year. I thought it was mold from a roof leak, but no. My handyman cut some holes in the drywall and cleaned out the nest and all surrounding insulation. I sprayed it down good with a 1-gallon pump sprayer I picked up from Home Depot for $9.95. The smell was mostly gone within minutes. I will reapply tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: BarkityBark

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm reacting to the living organisms in this
customer_reviews.text: Made my cough worse and my throat extra itchy. I think the living organisms weren't so good for my respiratory system. Several months later, my throat is better, but I'm definitely reluctant to use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely better than some of the scented ones out there but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely better than some of the scented ones out there but it doesn’t magically make the urine smell disappear. Still has a bit of residual “cleanser” smell that while not as offensive as scented cleaners is still not all too pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nishizaka

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and is a yellow color.
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT work for me. Didn't even take the color out of a fresh urine spot! For $34 I feel it should have worked better. Very soapy/foamy, I had to use my dirt devil spot scrubber vac to get the soap out. Will go back to basic Nature's Miracle. Better price.
customer_reviews.author: Barb S

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I can't count the number of products I tried to relieve the stench of cat urine, so I was skeptical this would do any better. When a brand-new chair fell victim to feline assault I had to try something and this was it. WOW. I can't believe it!!! No more smell, and it works on wood, cement and metal surfaces that have met similar misfortune over the years. It is easy to apply (get an injector for upholstery) and the no-scent version doesn't leave any odor. It may leave a stain marking where it was applied, so test first. I was able to remove that mark with subsequent cleaning. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Greybirds2

customer_reviews.title: A Futon Miracle
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted a cat, and he had a few accidents on our red futon before he got used to using the litter box. As this occurred on a unibody futon, there was no way to remove the cover or padding for deep cleaning. However, the enzymes in this product worked wonderfully and eradicated the smell COMPLETELY. You would never know the cat had touched the couch, much less had an accident. Best of all, though, there was no color damage to our beautiful dark red futon!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Semi-effective
customer_reviews.text: Our neurotic cat is bad about peeing in the house, so it is an ongoing problem. It's not a miracle solution, but seems to help some, so I'm continuing to use it because I haven't found anything the works better. I didn't like the pre-treatment they also sell because it was too soapy and I couldn't get it all out of the carpet after repeatedly rinsing with our carpet cleaner machine.
customer_reviews.author: J P's Hideaway

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY truly unscented solution out there.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried literally dozens of pet stain/odor remover products, and they all STINK to synthetic perfumes. Some are so strong they burn your nostrils, give you a headache and just seem to be masking one smell with another. This one has a very light inoffensive odor that disappears immediately, and takes the urine smell with it.
customer_reviews.author: iXlad66

customer_reviews.title: I hope you never need this
customer_reviews.text: I hope you never have to search for an odor remover but if you do, search no more. I have a neutered male spraying inside the house. I was using Natures Miracle but switched to this when it was suggested by my Cat Behaviorist. My cat is still spraying but Mister Max does a wonderful job of eliminating the odor without leaving a heavy scent.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I tried several other products before this one and this is the only one that worked.
customer_reviews.text: I have a spot on my carpet my cat decided to use as a litter box. I think we caught it relatively early and it had only been peed on a few times. Since this product said to make sure all layers under the carpet were saturated I just went ahead and poured it directly on the area (about half a gallon's worth) and then stomped around on it to make sure it was really mushed in. It took about a week to dry, but now I can't detect any smell at all! The product is truly unscented and not only removed the cat pee smell but didn't leave behind any flowery perfumey smell also.
customer_reviews.author: Alli D.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent... or non-scent?
customer_reviews.text: Seriously amazing. Had cat pee and cat poop odor soaked into a concrete basement floor that wasn't sealed very well. Poured it on, covered it with cut-open garbage bags (per another reviewer's recommendation) and let it sit a for a day. My basement not only lost its cat funk smell, but it smells clean-ish... almost like it's... empty. Major feat for this old, damp, dark basement. Worth the money. One bottle covered maybe 200 sq feet using it VERY generously.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woyda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all...not even a little bit!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the P-Bath product and did exactly as I was supposed to and it did not work at all!! I even did it a second and third time but the smell is still there (dog urine). I do not recommend purchasing this product...it is a waste of money and your time!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped My Dog From Marking
customer_reviews.text: I have a female dog who marks, which means I do a lot of laundry. I use to use vinegar because it was the only thing that could get the musky urine smell out. Apparently, the smell was still there because she continue to mark. I used this product to wash her bedding and spray the rugs and she has not marked since.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a Residue that Smells Like the Original Odor
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly for an older odor stain. The smell hasn't completely gone away. But here's the bizarre bit... The solution, after it dries, leaves slippery texture on the carpet , and when I run my fingers over the area, a gritty residue comes up that smells like the original pee odor.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Came home to this awesome mess. Tried the product following all directions
customer_reviews.text: I had a nasty large stain. Cat peed the bed. Then it dried. As I was out of town for two days. Roomate was watching the cat. Came home to this awesome mess. Tried the product following all directions. Slept on the couch for a week. Cat went in and marked the same spot after 3 applications and full drying and blotting and whatever. Threw out the mattress. Used the whole gallon.....
customer_reviews.author: Danrazzo

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We don't allow our dogs into the living room (parlor?) which has white carpet but one got into there and made a runny mess. We let it dry then cleaned up solid residue. Having heard about this product, I ordered it and applied it to the dark brown stain, it started going away immediately and is now gone. Finally a product that does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. Had to deal with an issue where cats found a favorite spot to pee on carpeted floor. Ripped out carpet but concrete was soaked and stunk. Many liberal doses of this (including covering it with plastic so it stayed wet and soaked down instead of drying out), and the smell is completely gone. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product even though the name is really strange.
customer_reviews.text: I also tried several treatments for a bedroom whose previous owner had 3 cats who they used the room as their own personal cat box. After pulling up the carpet and pad and treating the concrete floor using several cleaning methods. I was at the end of my rope. Then I read the reviews on Amazon for this product and it REALLY, REALLY works. Follow the directions on the label and you should have the same success I had. I also mopped it on the walls. Now there is no odor whatsoever and I didn't even have to use Kilz to paint the room.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: On my second jug trying to eliminate odor in areas cat has peed outside of cat box. Used a black light I ordered to enhance areas and knew when I had finally gotten the scent out after using this as the area no longer lit up with black light. Has a great clean smell. Works very well. Wish it was less expensive though but it is a big jug. Used on light carpet and no staining or changing of color.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. We had raccoons nest in our chimney while we were gone, and had to get a chimney sweep out to clean and deodorize the fireplace area. His cleaning was good, but the awful feces/urine smell remained despite his bleach/deodorizer application. So I ordered a bottle of this stuff (pricey, but we were desperate and already had $200 in the C.S.) and poured about half of it down the chimney with the damper closed. In two days the smell was gone and hasn't returned. Next step: a chimney cap!
customer_reviews.author: 123barn456

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a variety of cleaning products to clean dog urine but they have all left a cleaner combined with urine smell. A friend recommended I try Anti-Icky-Poo and I can honestly say, this stuff really works! It is the ONLY product I've ever used that completely eradicates the urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Sandefur

customer_reviews.title: at first thought it didn't work but i think it just takes time to work
customer_reviews.text: it took awhile but i dont see the cats returning to same areas.. so it took several gallons over a fairly long time period but seems to be working so far. its hard to assess because you dont really know for sure unless you see cat going but i have not seen them looking in same places to go .. so will continue to assess. just ordered another gallon. will modify review as i monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible. It removed the scent and stains from dog pee from wooden subfloors with 2 applications. We put it in a garden sprayer and that worked perfectly. I would absolutely recommend to anyone and will definitely use it in the future if we have a pet accident happen!
customer_reviews.author: Liddy

customer_reviews.title: I needed something to eliminate cat urine smell that came ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to eliminate cat urine smell that came with the house I purchased. I did everything to get rid of the smell. This was my last recourse. Unfortunately, I can still smell it. I had no choice but to paint over it and then just put laundry beads to mask the odor. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: ImpressedbyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if i had to.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my dog continually peeing in the same place in my house. Thank goodness it was on vinyl planks but it left a smell no matter how many cleanings. This works! It was a bigger quantity than I needed but it worked so it was fine, worth every penny I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nature's Miracles for years and lately they have updated their formula and I find that 1. it doesn't work as well and 2. it now has a horrible deodorizing smell that we find way worse than the smell of cat urine! We were traveling a bit and our cats were less than thrilled - they took their frustration out on our sofa. Enter Mister Max Unscented Anti Icky Poo. Our sofa has been saved. It cut through the smell and doesn't leave any kind of headachy deodorized smell. Super pleased. Will only buy this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: RevDWM

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! No lingering smell after washing. It has gotten cat pee out of clothes, towels, floors! I used to use Petastic years ago, and that worked great, but then they changed the formula and nothing has worked well since. Until this stuff! We foster kittens and this is our 5th bottle of this stuff. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Use unscented only. My cat was to tall for the litter box and urinated outside the box. I didn't know for a couple days when the smell got bad. I cleaned it up and sprayed with unscented anti icky poo and I have no smells from cats. When you walk in my home you wouldn't know I had cats. I just bought a wool rug that smells of dig urine. I vacuumed and sprayed it down and dried with a fan fir the day and the smell is almost gone. I'm spraying the under side of rug. Can't wait for it to dry so I can use my rug. This stuff is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best enzyme cleaner on the market for cat urine
customer_reviews.text: This is the only enzyme cleaner we've found that truly works on cat urine. One of our cats started peeing on the carpet around the house and we tried multiple widely available enzyme cleaners (Nature's Miracle, Rocco & Roxy, etc) but they never really got rid of the urine smell and also left behind horrible fragrances. The unscented Anti Icky Poo truly has no scent once it dries, and is the only product that has completely gotten rid of the urine. For older, dried spots, it does require multiple applications over a few days so you do end up going through the product quite quickly, but it is totally worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a Godsend. ~$1700 in brand new carpet trashed by very bad tenants with long term dog urination problem, which they denied to my face. 3 days after heavy application of this product with ceiling fans on and the windows open, the house smells good again. 4 stars (not 5) only because long term duration of effect is unknown. With other reviews as a guide, a 5 star review is a reasonable inference.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Vince P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. The previous review had me at "crime scene cleanup". If it can clean up a crime scene I was sure it could handle my senior dog's spotting on the rungs. You can watch the pee stain disappear as you spray it. Works wonders. By far better than Nature's Miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: DID THE TRICK
customer_reviews.text: WORKED. SPRAYED IN MY POTTED PLANTS AND AROUND THE FOUNDATION OF MY PORCHES, FAVORITE SPOTS FOR MY CATS. SMELL WAS GONE BY THE NEXT DAY. COULD NOT BELIEVE IT WAS THAT FAST. WINDY WEATHER HELPED, BUT AFTER THE WIND WAS GONE THE SMELL WE HAD FOR MONTHS WAS ALSO GONE. IT HAS BEEN A FEW WEEKS, STILL NO RETURN OF THE YUCKY ODOR.
customer_reviews.author: Patron

customer_reviews.title: Once you try it, you won't want any other pet odor products.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for years to clean up kitty oopses, including some nasty ones as cats aged and got ill. It's the best stuff on the market by far. Unlike other products, you can mix it in with water, soap, etc. without rendering it useless. I also started using it in the wash as a booster for everything from nasty running gear to a soiled animal blanket. It gets the stink out better than anything else I've found, even specialty anti-odor detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Daemonaquila

customer_reviews.title: Grateful I found this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Having tried several well known brands that promised to fully eliminate urine odors. Nothing I'd tried before had worked thoroughly, even with repeated applications. This stuff works so well I invested in the gallon size. Urine is amazingly destructive an effective cleaner is the only chance at mitigating. Wish I didn't have the need for this stuff but I'm grateful I found it.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for cat urine
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing to remove cat urine smell. I sprayed, soaked items for DAYS with this stuff...used shampoo extractor, etc etc, absolutely nothing. Had to buy Natures miracle for cat urine, that worked.
customer_reviews.author: BBBz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 small dogs, 3 of them rescues. Fighting with accidents sadly is a way of life. I have tried a lot of different stain removers. I have to say this one is magic. It removes the stain and the smell. And it is reasonably priced and comes in a large enough container to help me with my 4. I'll buy it again (and again and again)
customer_reviews.author: Shari Powell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is kind of a chemical smell, but it goes away once dry. Works perfect I’ve ordered multiple for spraying down our subfloor before redoing it or for accidents. I’ve even sprayed it on my daughters mattress.
customer_reviews.author: bbaran

customer_reviews.title: Smell be-gone!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have animals, this product is awesome. All animals have accidents in the home. This will eliminate all animal odor. Plus it doesn't leave its own odor. I use it in the garage because of the strays that come in to eat food.
customer_reviews.author: Graham-Cracker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I will never use anything else for pet accidents! I have used many different products over the years, and they all seem to just mask the urine odor with fragrance rather than getting rid of it. Any time it got humid in the house all I could smell was old urine and the product's fragrance mixed together...not pleasant. I use the unscented Anti Icky Poo and it totally removes the stain and odor of both urine and feces. I smell nothing emanating from the carpet when it gets humid. I will continue to purchase this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Wandersee

customer_reviews.title: Odor Removal is Only Part of Behavior Modification!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Odor Remover. It will not necessarily solve your pet's BEHAVIOR. Rule out medical causes!! Smell is usually only part of the problem. Behavior modification is often not as simple as cleaning up the evidence. Anti Icky Poo has helped keep many animals in their homes, including my own cat, but as a part of a multiple factor plan. As a cvt, I've recommended it to literally hundreds of clients during my career. Please give your pet a real chance to succeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used entire gallon on small section of wood floor as ...
customer_reviews.text: Used entire gallon on small section of wood floor as directed. Smell did not go away from urine. Returned as it said works or your money back so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Zane H.

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of the Urine Odor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I had a precious old incontinent cat, now passed on, much to my sadness. I used this in the washing machine with the many towels and bedding she wet her last few weeks alive. Now I am using it in the wash with the family undies.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Never without it in a home with cats.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Sometimes have to repeat a few times. Highly recommend the syringe which enables injecting the solution into and beyond the padding onto the concrete. Insides complet coverage.
customer_reviews.author: NanaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: No fragrance smell. Poured whole bottle on a 3x2 carpeted area. Got rid of urine smell by the time it dried. Did leave a small discoloring on carpet. Fast shipping. Received the product within 2 days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: It really removes stubborn odors better than any other productive I've used.
customer_reviews.text: We have a "high traffic" household - boys into sports, two dogs and two cats - and we have a lot of spills, pet accidents and smells. We have a carpet shampooer that gets a lot of use, but there are some odors that nothing else - Bissel carpet shampoo formulations, baking soda, Resolve products, Febreeze products - cannot remove. This one took care of the problem odors. Really works as well as advertised,
customer_reviews.author: S. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works, it removed the cat spray odors from my flip flops, as well as my foot odor, the label states it removes all pet marking odors from multiple surfaces, I have also used it on my car tires and wheels, it keeps dogs,and cats from remarking my car for weeks, works better than cayenne pepper! Nate
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. We have an elderly cat who has been avoiding her litter box and peeing on our concrete basement floor. Nothing worked to erase the odor until I found this product. Highly recommend! It doesn’t just cover up the smell, it actually works to eliminate it. Your house will just smell clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Jkrasley

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: we have several grand puppies that have designated a spot in an upper hall has their toilet. This works on individual spots, but we are overwhelmed. If you have a dog that has accidents this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rohdy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first unscented odor removing product that really works! Used it on a solid wood floor (treated several times with other products) especially for the area between the floor boards (sometimes the pups miss the wee wee pad). I can put my nose to the floor and not smell the urine odor that was previously there. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great!!!! I have a kitty that made a huge mess on our brand new comforter. I used a black light flashlight to see the stain and poured this directly on it and let it sit for about 30 minutes before washing. I used the black light on it again after the comforter had dried completely and the stain was 100% gone!!! Works waaaay better than what you can purchase at a big box pet store i.e. natures miracle or bissell stain and order removers. I have also used it on blood from our dog (has bad chin acne that sometimes bleeds on the couch) and it takes it out in seconds. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Greasy residue!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well at getting rid of cat pee smell, but leaves a greasy residue that is very hard to wipe off. I used it on a vinyl floor and it looked like everything was clean and dry but later I almost slipped and fell. I was wearing rubberized slippers at the time! Also, this product has an odd scent. I will not buy again. Nature’s Miracle works just as well without the greasy residue.
customer_reviews.author: chrislink

customer_reviews.title: odor problems
customer_reviews.text: WE had a very bad odor in our rental house from a renter having cats. (And other things). I used this on concrete and it took the odor out. I will keep some on hand to use for ot her problems.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what the hype is??? Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, went to the website and did multiple applications. Still doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to boys

customer_reviews.title: Wowzers - it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a blessing! Has gotten the nasty cat urine smell off of fabric, a down comforter and a cat carrier. Zero fragrance. So happy to have found this!
customer_reviews.author: On the move

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I work in a vet office and everyone ranted and raved over this product. I bought it, followed the directions. And it made my room smell AWFUL. It didn’t even smell before, but I figured it could help with stains and any odor there might have been. It was terrible. It took five day’s to dry (with fans), and the entire house smelled like moldy urine. I ended up having to get my carpets professionally cleaned. Super upset. This product ruined my carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and find it works better that Natures Miracle. I like the unscented version. I recently bought a spray bottle of Natures Miracle Advance at a pet shop when I ran out of Mister Max and that stuff STINKS! I won't buy Nature's Miracle again. Mister Max Anti-Icy-Poo cleans all my animals' spots effectively. I even use it to pre-treat washing the dogs' bed covers.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: We've tried other "smell removers" like this in the past with no success
customer_reviews.text: Multiple cats, two of whom were ill for a while and peed on the old wooden floor that we hadn't yet sanded down and waxed. Not ideal. This stuff worked wonders! It not only removed the smell as far as our human noses were concerned, it seems to have removed the scent as far as the cats are concerned as well, and we no longer have issues with them thinking that is an ok spot to pee in. We've tried other "smell removers" like this in the past with no success, so we're very pleased to have finally found one that works!
customer_reviews.author: L. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing! I'm a foster for kittens so accidents are bound to happen. This takes the smell out so well! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a lifesaver (or rug saver!)
customer_reviews.text: I've used it on cat spray, skunk spray (full disclosure, I locked one in the garage overnight...) and overall smells. The stuff works great.
customer_reviews.author: Aptos55

customer_reviews.title: This product worked well.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well. We had a cat that urinated all over our carpet. We used it on the concrete before putting hardwood floors down. There was no urine smell after several days of applying.
customer_reviews.author: Jhamlett

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I tried everythingggg to get the smell of cat pee out of my carpet after my kitty got a UTI and had a few accidents on the carpet, nothing worked!!!!! This cleared up the scent like it never even happened, amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: This really does work. Better than anything else I've tried. And I've tried lots. But you need to use a lot. If the stain is on carpet you need to dowse it. Like half a gallon so it soaks through to the padding and subfloor. Which isn't a problem except it's $40/gallon which is steep to me. But you pour it on and wait a week for it to work. What could be easier?
customer_reviews.author: Crow T Robot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the previous brand we had, and it doesn't make my skin unhappy, either! 5 stars! We're a 7 cat household with some territorial issues, so being able to remove the smell of urine is a must. Very pleased wtih this brand!
customer_reviews.author: C. Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...looking for something else now.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th product I've tried for our dogs, and this didn't do any better than the others. I'm beginning to think nothing actually removes the odors, they just clean the visible stains.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stout

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. We purchased a home that had a terrible ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. We purchased a home that had a terrible vomit smell in the concrete in the garage. We had tried to clean it multiple times with bleach with no results. I used this product and the smell is gone! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: The first round of treatment did very little
customer_reviews.text: It was in a rental and there may have been a lot of cat pee, but I smelled very little difference after saturating the carpet. I even put plastic over ti for hours to let it work longer. After it dried almost no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof7

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for messes left by my animal companions. I especially use it for fabrics, rugs, bedding. I'll even use it in the regular wash if the laundry is particularly dirty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amber c

customer_reviews.title: Works unbelievably !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many odor remover items that are suppose to remove or eradicate urine odors, especially on wood floors. They all seem to work until it is humid and the odor returns - it was never completely gone. This product works absolutely the best of anything I have ever tried. I used it once on an area of wood floor, where the other products had supposedly worked, only to have odor return, Anti Icky Poo really DID WORK, we had a week of intense humidity and there is absolutely, positively NO ODOR!!! I will be reordering this item as long as I own cats.
customer_reviews.author: silkpurs29

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I even took up the tile and scrubbed both sides and what was underneath and they are still going there. I should have known when it had an option for month deliver. Why? if it works, who would need monthly delivery?
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of urine order fast
customer_reviews.text: New cat was spraying all over the house. Anti Icky Poo got rid of the urine and the smell. I combined that with Dumb Cat, which I sprayed all over the inside and outside of the house (neighbor cats were spraying outside) and no more trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Big Cat Designs

customer_reviews.title: Works great, cannot recommend highly enough
customer_reviews.text: I am SO GLAD this product exists and is affordable. It has greatly reduced "repeat offenses" by my dog. Their stain eliminator also works well.
customer_reviews.author: APB

customer_reviews.title: Mister Max Unscented Anti Icky Poo Odor Remover
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product, but I also have to continue to use it on the same carpet to rid it of the odors in it. Once was not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elmore H.

customer_reviews.title: Anti icky poo
customer_reviews.text: Cat nearly destroyed the inside of our Jeep. The smell was beyond overwhelming. Used this stuff as directed and now we are enjoying our Jeep again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than store
customer_reviews.text: I am training my puppy and I was worried about the odder and it takes the smell out of my floors and my couch. I love that the product does not have an odder after my floors dry I use another smelling chemical to have my smell
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Delong

customer_reviews.title: Good odor remover
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well on dog odors. It was so so with cat odors. I treat the spots right away. There's no visible staining when I'm done, but the odor tends to linger, particularly with the cat urine.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy.  Don't spend your money on any other "urine" remover.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. If you catch a "mess" relatively soon after it occurs there is no better product to get your carpet, furniture, etc back to new. They swear it will get rid of any urine smell, but that's not true. I had to have some carpet replaced after I tried PLENTY of icky-poo. But I still love this product and use it for small accidents. But for large - older problems, this may not be enough. I wouldn't use any other carpet spray though. This really is the best.
customer_reviews.author: n_deamicis

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dog owners/guardians/parents
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine having a dog without this stuff. Used it when my dog had " accidents" during potty training and still use it when " didn't you hear me I need to do out" ocaisionally happens!! Was recommended to me by a pet store owner many years ago- great recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Austenfan

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended. I"m not sure this review is the one to pay attention to. I had a large space to cover maybe 10 X 15. So I may have put the product on too thin. It did improve the pet smell. It didn't get rid of it. On the label it says to reapply as many times as needed. Reapplying at $44 per gallon is costly. I"m going to try the vinegar and baking soda thing next.
customer_reviews.author: JC.   Flower

customer_reviews.title: This product works extremely well for getting rid of cat ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely well for getting rid of cat urine smell. Ingrained stains especially on wooden surfaces might need more than one application. It did not stop my kitty from spraying inside my house and going back to her regular spots. But at least, as long as I find it promptly and treat it with this enzyme cleaner, it will get rid of the urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: Annelise Leibbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This works on pet urine. You do need a lot of it to get the smell out. Make sure to follow the directions. Soak the area and let it air dry. The product doesn't have a strong odor like some others.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Happy Rescue
customer_reviews.text: AIP was recommended by a vet we hear on Wisconsin Public Radio and she is right this product works 👍 great
customer_reviews.author: Big Eyes Who Look Far

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have the unscented option
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have the unscented option. This does a pretty good job of removing a urine scent when used in the wash to soak items for a few hours. I prefer the lack of perfumes in cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a godsend! My cat ended up getting crystals in his bladder around Christmas time and apparently didn’t like our real tree, and not only did he pee on the tile by litter box he peed under the tree on carpet! I am very sensitive to smells especially animal smells, and I was literally going crazy trying to get it out with alternative formulas. The reviews really helped seal the deal for me. I dumped a bunch right over where he peed and the next morning I care downstairs and couldn’t smell a thing!!! Thank you Amazon!!!! I will be purchasing this in future if need be!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as I had hoped and the other reviews would indicate. I have a good amount of old cat urine in my concrete slab foundation and this didn't kill the smell as I had hoped. Still searching for something that will actually do the job right.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this stuff works! I first clean the area with apple cider vinegar then spray mister max and wipe off. Odor gone! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no smell afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Works the best and was referred to me! My dogs can’t detect any smell from previous dogs. And they are very good sniffers!
customer_reviews.author: Key-Wee’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I used to love Nature's Miracle Cat Urine Destroyer until they changed the formula and made it absolutely terrible smelling. I'm glad I found something better!
customer_reviews.author: kc91

product_meta.title: Mister Max Unscented Anti Icky Poo Odor Remover, Gallon Size
product_meta.description: Size:Gallon SizeMisterMax Anti-Icky-Poo will remove cat urine, dog urine, skunk musk, vomit, feces and a whole host of other decaying organic materials. Remove cat smells, dog smells, urine smells, skunk smells and more from your carpet today with Anti-Icky-Poo. This product is non toxic, is good for the environment and won't hurt your pets. "THIS PRODUCT IS THE REAL DEAL FOR YOUR ODOR PROBLEM." If you tried other products first, then you need to use P-BATH first before using "ANTI ICKY POO".
feature_bullets: Anti Icky Poo is "GREEN AND ENVIORMENTLY FRIENDLY, SAFE TO THE ENVIROMENT AND SAFE TO HUMANS AND PETS." AND SAFE TO THE ENVIROMENT," YOU MUST TRY THIS PRODUCT! YOU WILL BE AMAZED
Absolutely removes (not hides) odor from Dog, Cat, Skunk, Rodents, Human, almost all urine and vomit
Anti-Icky-Poo uses a live bacteria to eliminate any organic bacteria
Anti-Icky-Poo's friendly microbes eats away the source of odor and eliminates the problem from returning
You may need to use P-Bath first if you have used other cleaning products

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars681 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
